articles.author: Samuel Axon
articles.title: Apple’s headphone adapter for older iPhones sells out, possibly never to return - Ars Technica
articles.description: The end of Lightning is nigh. It’s a bummer for folks with older phones, though.

articles.author: Matthew Loh
articles.title: Trump picked a Project 2025 coauthor to run the FCC. Here's what it means for Big Tech. - Business Insider
articles.description: Carr authored a chapter of Project 2025 that advocates for "reining in Big Tech," accusing it of pushing out certain political views.
articles.content:
President-elect Donald Trump on Sunday announced Brendan Carr was his pick for Federal Communications Commission chair.
Carr, who has worked at the FCC since 2012, is the senior Republican on the co… [+3625 chars]
